name: Rewinded Past Self
description:
BUTTONS Left ClickMove your character / target enemyLeft Click + Left ShiftAttackRight ClickDash ABOUT THE GAME

Every levels are proceduraly generated
Your goal is to find the end portal of each level
When you step out of the spawn platform, time ( blue bar ) starts running out 
When time reaches 0, you are teleported back to spawn
But, next time you step out of the spawn platform, your past self will rewind the actions you made last time

there is also a random shop where u can buy upgrades btw
